data.persona: I'm a pelican. I have white feathers and a beak. I love to fly above the water and look for fish to eat. I spend my time with the other pelicans.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's a seashell, a water, a sand, and a sea glass here.
The there is the lighthouse keeper on his daily walk up the boardwalk. is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get sand so that I can dig up some seashells.
data.mid_motivation: I am flying about the coast looking for fish and other things to eat.
data.long_motivation: I need to look a good place to build my nest and feed my hatchlings.
